page.title: 05VISITING HIGHTOWN OF CRAIGS
page.content: The farmer,{MR. McKEACHIE,}has owned this farm for about 18 years.He also owns the neighbouring small holding-{ {JENNYGILL}.Although Jennygill is not in our block the two farms are farmed as one unit and both farms are typical of our area. Our visit was to {HIGHTOWN OF {CRAIGS.}Duncan asked Mr. McKeachie when the farm was built.He couldn't remember but said it was before his time anyway.The farm is not very modern but Mr. McKeachie said he liked doing things the "old way". He employs two full time workers and his son also works part time.He grows 50 acres of hay and oats for feeding purposes.There is a dairy herd of 71 cows which are milked twice daily.They are worked through 5 milking units.The rest of the livestock consists of 2 Friesian bulls and 1 Angus bull.
